title: High School Community Health Worker Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and general understanding of community health activities
context.additional_context: Blended learning primarily supported online but with main instruction conducted offline in classrooms; learners access supplementary materials via smartphones, with project-based assessments addressing community health issues

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more community health issues within six months and propose solutions considering cultural contexts.
Learners can prepare basic medical records and health education materials with 80% accuracy according to CHW core competencies (C3 Project standards).
Learners can improve communication skills by conducting five or more virtual patient consultation simulations using smartphone-based digital tools.

resources: Regional public health center collaboration network
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
